hiveArticle.title: Spring or Autumn? What do you think
hiveArticle.body:
# <center> Namaste, Have a great day everyone</center>

### <center>What do you think looking at the below picture, is it Spring or Autumn? and Why?</center>
<center>The image was taken from the train while travelling to Kolkata</center>

<hr>

![IMG_20171012_162318~2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQWrBdMpHYuo4w7CYzPkZks3na72iyo3mBaqzjUPKojyk/IMG_20171012_162318~2.jpg)

<hr>

# <center>Camera : Nokia 6, Edited on phone</center>
